AcceptBid(uint256,address,uint256,addres.notice: Accepts the specified bid to supply to the pool.

RejectBid(uint256,address,uint256,addres.notice: Rejects the bid to supply to the pool.

RepayFullAmount(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Repays the full amount for the loan.

Withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,address.notice: Allows the lender to withdraw the loan bid if it is still pending.

calculateNextDueDate(uint256,address,uin.notice: Calculates and returns the next due date.

isPaymentLate(uint256,address,uint256,ad.notice: Checks if loan repayment is late.

supplyToPool(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: Allows a lender to supply funds to the pool owner.

viewFullRepayAmount(uint256,address,uint.notice: Returns the full amount to be repaid.

viewInstallmentAmount(uint256,address,ui.notice: Returns the installment amount to be paid at the called timestamp.
